sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import toast, { Toaster } from 'react-hot-toast'; function App() { const [pin, setPin] = useState(''); const [scanStatus, setScanStatus] = useState(null); const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(false); const [scanResults, setScanResults] = useState(null); const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (!pin.trim()) { toast.error('Lütfen PIN kodunu girin'); return; } setIsLoading(true); setScanStatus('pending'); setScanResults(null); try { const response = await axios.post('/api/verify-pin', { pin: pin.trim() }); if (response.data.message.includes('başlatıldı')) { toast.success('PIN doğrulandı! Tarama başlatıldı.'); setScanStatus('pending'); setTimeout(() => { setScanStatus('completed'); setScanResults({ data: { riskLevel: 'Düşük', securityChecks: { malware: 'Temiz', suspiciousActivity: 'Tespit edilmedi' }, recommendations: ['Sistem güncel', 'Antivirus aktif'] }, completedAt: new Date() }); toast.success('Tarama tamamlandı!'); }, 3000); } } catch (error) { toast.error(error.response?.data?.message || 'Bir hata oluştu'); setScanStatus('error'); } finally { setIsLoading(false); } }; return (
{Array.from({ length: 50 }).map((_, i) => (
))}
VOID
ADVANCED SECURITY SCANNER
Professional Anti-Cheat Detection System
setPin(e.target.value.toUpperCase())} maxLength="8" disabled={isLoading} style={{ width: '100%', padding: '20px', border: '2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3)', borderRadius: '10px', fontSize: '18px', background: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1)', color: '#fff', backdropFilter: 'blur(10px)', transition: 'all 0.3s ease', textAlign: 'center', letterSpacing: '3px', fontWeight: '600' }} />
{scanStatus && (

{scanStatus === 'pending' && 'SCAN IN PROGRESS'} {scanStatus === 'completed' && 'SCAN COMPLETED'} {scanStatus === 'error' && 'SCAN FAILED'}

{scanStatus === 'pending' && (

System analysis in progress...

Estimated time: 3 minutes

)} {scanStatus === 'completed' && scanResults && (
RISK LEVEL
{scanResults.data.riskLevel}
MALWARE
{scanResults.data.securityChecks.malware}
SECURITY REPORT

Suspicious Activity: {scanResults.data.securityChecks.suspiciousActivity}

Scan Date: {new Date(scanResults.completedAt).toLocaleString('tr-TR')}

{scanResults.data.recommendations && (
RECOMMENDATIONS
    {scanResults.data.recommendations.map((rec, index) => (
  • {rec}
    • ))}
)}
)}
)}
); } export default App;
